tools.name: Pearl
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptable library for reinforcement learning and evolutionary computation
tools.detailed_description: Pearl provides a set of adaptable tools designed to facilitate the creation and experimentation of reinforcement learning and evolutionary computation algorithms, focusing on modularity and ease of use for optimization tasks.

tools.name: EvoloPy
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for classical and recent nature-inspired metaheuristics
tools.detailed_description: EvoloPy is a Python toolbox that provides a collection of classical and recent nature-inspired metaheuristic algorithms for global optimization problems, enabling researchers to benchmark and apply these methods.

tools.name: UnitCommitment.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Optimization package for Security-Constrained Unit Commitment
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package developed by Argonne National Laboratory for solving the Security-Constrained Unit Commitment (SCUC) problem in power systems, providing optimization models for energy grid management.

tools.name: AgileRL
tools.one_line_profile: Reinforcement learning framework with evolutionary hyperparameter optimization
tools.detailed_description: AgileRL streamlines reinforcement learning by integrating evolutionary hyperparameter optimization directly into the training process, aiming for faster and more efficient training of RL agents.

tools.name: CMA-ESpp
tools.one_line_profile: C++ implementation of the CMA-ES optimization algorithm
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight C++ implementation of the Covariance Matrix Adaptation Evolution Strategy (CMA-ES), a popular derivative-free optimization algorithm used for non-linear/non-convex optimization problems.

tools.name: ExpensiveOptimBenchmark

tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for benchmarking surrogate-based optimization algorithms on expensive black-box functions, facilitating the evaluation and comparison of optimization strategies in scientific computing.

tools.name: ParBayesianOptimization

tools.detailed_description: An R package for performing Bayesian Optimization with support for parallel execution, designed to optimize expensive black-box functions efficiently.

tools.name: PythonRobotics

tools.name: MLBox

tools.name: VOPy

tools.detailed_description: A Python framework designed for black-box vector optimization problems, providing algorithms and tools for multi-objective optimization where gradients are unavailable.

tools.name: NLoptNet

tools.name: EvoTune

tools.name: TransOPT

tools.name: SOLNP_plus

tools.name: DEAP

tools.name: sqpdfo

tools.detailed_description: A Python package for derivative-free optimization using Sequential Quadratic Programming, designed for solving constrained optimization problems without gradient information.
